ACCARDI
v.
HARTFORD UNDERWRITERS INSURANCE COMPANY 42A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 25, 2019 Daniel K. Bryson, J. Hunter Bryson, Attorneys at Law, for Accardi, Thomas Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kim E. Rinehart, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, David R. Roth, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Hartford Underwriters Insurance Company Mark R. Sigmon, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for United Policyholders

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of February 2019 by United Policyholders for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of February 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
